definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Gastrointestinal disorders big investigation, the health to take home.
sentences.chinese: 胃腸道疾病大排查，把健康帶回家。

sentences.english: He was laid up for a week by an intestinal bug.
sentences.chinese: 他因爲腸道感染細菌休息了一週。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To investigate the absorption characteristics and mechanism of bergenin in rat intestine.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究巖白菜素在大鼠腸道中的吸收機理。

sentences.english: Objective To study the diagnosis and treatment of gastrointestinal carcinoid.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討胃腸道類癌的診斷和治療。

sentences.english: Probiotics contain live micro-organisms, so-called good bacteria that colonize the intestine.
sentences.chinese: 益生菌含有活力微生物，可以在腸道內存活繁殖。

sentences.english: Conclusion "Zhishi Xiaopi Decoction" is effective to improve the gastrointestinal dysfunction in severe patients.
sentences.chinese: 結論枳實消痞方能改善危重病患者胃腸道障礙。

sentences.english: This beneficial bacteria inbeds itself in the walls of the intestines.
sentences.chinese: 這些益菌會聚留在腸道壁上。

sentences.english: Blastocystis hominis is a unicellular protozoan commonly found in the intestinal tract of human and mammal.
sentences.chinese: 人芽囊原蟲是一種常見的人和哺乳動物腸道寄生原蟲。

sentences.english: The problems all begin because of the natural condition of the intestine of a very young infant.
sentences.chinese: 所有的問題都始自小嬰兒腸道的自然環境。

sentences.english: Prophylaxis usage of floxacin could not reduce patient'gastrointestinal infection.
sentences.chinese: 預防性使用氟嗪酸不能減少腸道感染。

sentences.english: Scientists want to know whether certain gut bacteria influence humans' behavior.
sentences.chinese: 科學家想確定腸道細菌是否能影響人的行爲。

sentences.english: Consequently, the molecular mediators regulating the secretion of salt and fluid in the gut do not get fully activated.
sentences.chinese: 結果，調控腸道水鹽分泌的調節分子未獲得充分活化。

sentences.english: In rare cases, the intestine perforates and the infant dies.
sentences.chinese: 極少數的個案，出現腸道出現穿孔而導致死亡。

sentences.english: This is Fluffy. She has some problems with her intestines.
sentences.chinese: 這是佛拉菲，她的腸道有些問題。

sentences.english: Dietary fiber also can facilitate intestinal recovery after enterocolitis induced by chemotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 膳食纖維還有利於化療引起的腸道炎症恢復。

sentences.english: Conclusions IPHC has no adverse effect on the healing of gastrointestinal anastomosis.
sentences.chinese: 結論IPHC對胃腸道吻合口癒合沒有不良影響。

definition: within the body/in vivo (vs in vitro)/internal to
to absorb (nutrients etc)/to assimilate/intake/to take a photograph of (a scene)
